titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Hertford to his Majesty. With his Maiesties gracious answer thereunto. Also, the humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Bedford, to the Kings most excellent Majesty. With his Maiesties gracious answer thereunto.

publicationStmt.publisher: Januar. 7. By Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Univerty [sic],
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed by his Majesties command, at Oxford :

notesStmt.note: A reprint of Wing H3519, with the Bedford petition added.

In spite of the particularity of the imprint, most of the ornaments are unknown at Oxford, nor would the carelessness of "Univerty" on the title-page have been allowed by the University printer--Madan.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "at Lond: Jan 11th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
